main_challenges_desc: View and collect rewards for daily challenges
tournament_leaderboard_target_desc: Catch the longest %s to win prizes
tournament_prize_money_desc: View the prize money for tournaments
no_treasures_to_sell: You don't have any treasures to sell
treasure_sale_failed: Failed to sell treasure. Please try again.
net_bait_desc: Add or view bait in the net
no_fishing: This area is not suitable for fishing.
dig_in_vehicle: You can't dig while in a vehicle.
invalid_ground: You can't dig here. Find some soft ground.
net_no_zone: You can only place fishing nets in designated areas!
net_near_water: You need to be near water to place a fishing net.
fishing_hat_on: You put on your Lucky Fishing Hat
fishing_hat_off: You took off your Lucky Fishing Hat
boat_occupied: All boat spawn locations are currently occupied. Please try again later.
boat_spawned: Your rental boat has been spawned. A waypoint has been set to its location.
boat_anchor_no_vehicle: You must be in a boat to use the anchor
boat_anchor_status_no_vehicle: You must be in a boat to check anchor status
fishing_level_up: Congratulations! Your fishing level is now %d
tournament_started: A new fishing tournament has started! Target fish: %s
tournament_ended: The fishing tournament has ended. Winners will be notified shortly!
tournament_win: You won %d place in the fishing tournament! Reward: $%d
collect_reward: You have collected $%d for completing the challenge!
unable_to_collect: Unable to collect reward. Challenge may not be completed or already rewarded.
rod_worn: Your fishing rod is getting worn out!
rod_needed: You need a fishing rod to fish!
rod_broke_casting: Your fishing rod broke while casting!
fish_nothing: You didn't catch anything this time.
no_bait_found: You didn't find any bait this time.
new_pb: You caught a new personal best %s! Length: %.2f"
new_record: A new record has been set for %s! Length: %.2f"
fish_sale_failed: Failed to sell fish. Please try again.
no_fish_to_sell: You don't have any fish to sell
level_too_low: You need to be level %d to buy this item
level_too_low_use: You need to be level %d to use this item
no_fishing_net: You don't have a fishing net!
too_many_nets: You already have a fishing net placed!
net_removed: Fishing net removed and returned to your inventory
repair_kit_needed: You need a %s to repair the net!
boat_rented: You've successfully rented a boat for $%d
boat_no_money: You don't have enough money to rent a boat
treasure_hunt_active: You're already on a treasure hunt!
treasure_hunt_started: A treasure hunt has begun! Check your map for the search area.
missing_lockpick: You need a %s to open the safe.
no_treasure_hunt_active: There are no active treasure hunts at the moment.
no_available_locations: No treasure hunt locations are available right now. Try again later.
invalid_treasure_hunt: This treasure hunt is no longer active.
net_invalid_position: This position isn't suitable for the net.
main_return_boat_desc: Return your rented boat and receive a $%d refund
boat_not_nearby: The rented boat is not nearby. Make sure it's within 50 meters of the NPC.
too_far_from_npc: You're too far from the NPC to return the boat.
boat_returned: You've successfully returned the rental boat.
boat_returned_refund: You've returned the rental boat and received a $%d refund.
boat_return_error: There was an error returning the boat. Please try again.
shovel_cooldown: You need to wait %s more seconds before using the bait shovel again.
purchase_desc: How many would you like to purchase?
